forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
The weather in Downtown San Francisco this morning greets us with a mostly sunny disposition, although the day carries a distinct hint of crispness, the air whispering of the cool temperatures that hover around 60 degrees, gradually sinking to a mellow 56 as the hours progress. A gentle north-northeast breeze nudges through the city, adding a touch of liveliness to the atmosphere. This clarity, complemented by scattered clouds, paints a pleasant scene, devoid of the fog that often drapes the Golden Gate. Yet a veil of marine layer might linger just off the coast, hinting at its presence in the distance, but for now, it has shown restraint.

As the day unfolds into the afternoon, dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket will offer just the right balance against the cooling daylight. This is an apt moment for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet visit to one of the charming local coffee shops, where warmth and the aroma of fresh brews invite respite. Such moments are perfect for enjoying the surroundings, fostering camaraderie with friends or simply savoring the peaceful ambiance of the city as it transitions toward evening. Tonight promises only a gentle watch of partly cloudy skies, seamlessly leading into a chillier embrace, beckoning you to retreat to cozy confines, perhaps with a good book.
